0.dialouge: Some words are carved into this stone.

1.dialouge: Known as Gaia's Heart, this plant is the only one of it's kind.

2.dialouge:
Indestructable,~ Immune to aging,~ emitting constant heat~ and preventing the land around from shifting.~
Its super natural powers are numerous,~ even for a phenomenon of the pillar.

3.dialouge:
Its shape and powers lead many to believe that this plant is some sort of heart, providing power to the pillar.~
For a period of time, many even thought that this spot was the center of pillar.
